tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PassengerFeedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  passenger_name VARCHAR(50),
  rating INT,
  comments TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE feedback_table (
    feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    passenger_id UUID,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE rating_table (
    rating_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    passenger_id UUID,
    overall_rating INT,
    cleanliness_rating INT,
    staff_behavior_rating INT,
    amenities_rating INT,
    rating_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE FeedbackLog (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  feedback_id INT,
  category_id INT,
  submission_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (feedback_id) REFERENCES PassengerFeedback(feedback_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES FeedbackCategories(category_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PassengerFeedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    passenger_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Passenger (
    passenger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    phone_number VARCHAR,
    total_feedbacks INT,
    total_ratings INT
);
